Hello, my friend, I am very glad that you came to my channel, if you are interested in the content that I shoot, then please do not be lazy and subscribe to my channel.

Various games will be released on my channel, of course, in good quality, so you will be pleased to watch.

I record all my videos using the Studio OBS  utility and then edit them in the Movavi video editor.
Usually all this takes 1-2 hours of my time🕓

If you want to use my video, then be sure to warn me about it, otherwise I will be forced to complain about you..
